intro.slide1Subtitle: Easily log your workouts, tracking each set
intro.slide2Subtitle: Track your progress and gains with our indepth analytics
intro.slide3Subtitle: Schedule your workouts ahead of time to stay consistent
intro.slide4Subtitle: Now lets get to know you a little bit better!

name.question: What should we call you?

triedApps.question: Have you tried other workout tracker apps?

goalComparison.title:
{{action}} twice as much
weight with Align
vs on your own
goalComparison.comparisonText:
Align makes it easy and holds
you accountable

goalReality.realisticTarget: {{diff}}{{unit}} is a realistic target. You can do this!

potential.question: You have amazing potential to reach your goals
potential.bodyCompositionText: Your body is ready for change. With consistent effort, you'll start seeing and feeling results sooner than you think.
potential.healthText: Investing in your health now will pay off for years to come. Every workout brings you closer to feeling your absolute best.
potential.consistencyText: Building a habit is the hardest part, and you've already taken the first step. We'll help you stay on track every day.
potential.loveText: This journey is all about you. Every rep, every session is a reminder of how strong and capable you truly are.
potential.fallbackText: You've already taken the first step. Stay consistent and you'll be amazed at what you can achieve.

healthSituations.question: Are you in any of the following situations?

energyFluctuation.question: Does your energy for training tend to fluctuate throughout the month?

workoutFrequency.question: How many times a week do you want to workout?

referral.question: Where did you hear about us?

reviews.title: Help us Grow!
reviews.sectionTitle:
Align was made for
people like you
reviews.review1Text: I lost 15 lbs in 2 months! I was about to go on Ozempic but decided to give this app a shot and it worked :)
reviews.review2Text: This app changed my fitness journey completely. The workouts are perfect and easy to follow!

planReady.title: Your plan is ready!
planReady.subtitle: We've created a personalized workout plan just for you.

generatePlan.stage3: Finding the best version of you...

planner.title: Planner
planner.founderBody1: We're Caleb & Cass, and we built Align. Thank you so much for trying our app!
planner.founderBody2: Our mission is to build the best women's workout tracker in the world, so any feedback you have would be greatly appreciated!
planner.founderBody3: You can email us at aligntracker@gmail.com
